sections.text: Section 17b-491. (Formerly Sec. 17a-342). - Pharmaceutical Assistance Program. Copayments. Reimbursement of prescriptions based on price paid by pharmacy and actual package size. Rebates and utilization review required for participating pharmaceutical manufactu

sections.heading: (Formerly Sec. 17a-342). - Pharmaceutical Assistance Program
sections.text: Copayments. Reimbursement of prescriptions based on price paid by pharmacy and actual package size. Rebates and utilization review required for participating pharmaceutical manufacturers. Contracts for supplemental rebates.

sections.heading: Prior authorization requirements for prescription drugs
sections.text: Schedule for dispensing of maximum quantities of oral dosage units. Submission of schedule and revisions thereto to General Assembly.

sections.heading: Reimbursement formula for drugs used to treat hemophilia A.
sections.text: Reimbursement formula for drugs used to treat hemophilia A.

sections.heading: Rebates for prescription drugs covered under state medical assistance program
sections.text: Calculating of unit rebate amounts. Contracts for supplemental rebates. Pharmaceutical manufacturers' participation in program. Rebates for new drugs. Payment for medically necessary drugs.

sections.heading: (Formerly Sec. 17a-343). - Eligibility
sections.text: Application period. Registration fee. ConnPACE program requirements. Payment for original and replacement prescriptions. Application prior to exhausting coverage. Regulations.

sections.heading: to 17b-498. (Formerly Secs. 17a-344 to 17a-349)
sections.text: - Generic substitution required. Regulations. Contract with fiscal intermediary; reports. Hearing. Penalties. Educational outreach program.
